[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1556079534384{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 8px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][cms_heading subtitle=”Services We Offer” subtitle_margin_bottom=”12px” subtitle_color=”#c4273a” text=”Newlane logistics, is a Global Logistics Provider.” description=”At Newlane logistics, we recognize that every logistic chain is unique and that each business has
its own specific requirements. That’s why we are dedicated to serving as an integrator of
comprehensive logistics services that meet your needs.” cms_template=”cms_heading–layout2.php”][cms_space space_lg=”40″ space_md=”40″ space_sm=”0″ space_xs=”0″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cms_row_overflow=”row-overflow-unset” css=”.vc_custom_1658134716131{margin-bottom: 52px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}” el_id=”air”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657906289521{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][cms_heading text=”Air Freight Services” title_font_size=”36px” title_line_height=”57px” cms_template=”cms_heading.php” el_class=”close-spacing”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906160478{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906385296{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678594296474{margin-bottom: 21px !important;}”]

At Newlane, we understand that the most important thing for our customers is to receive their packages as promptly and securely as possible. That’s why our team of professionals recommends using our air freight service for fast and reliable delivery.

At Newlane, we have a global network of international agencies that allows us to offer air freight forwarding and consolidation services for import shipments from every continent through a third party. Our team is well-trained in handling a variety of commodities, including dangerous goods, perishable items such as fresh and frozen flowers, vegetables, and meat, as well as time-sensitive cargo like fashion, pharmaceuticals, and automotive products. We are part of a select group of successful global networks and have a thorough understanding of the strengths and capabilities of different carriers in various destinations. Our team is dedicated to keeping you informed about the status of your cargo and providing feedback on the movement of your freight from the time you place your order with suppliers until the delivery reaches the consignee.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”1829″ img_size=”400×320″ alignment=”right” css_animation=”none” style=”box-overlay-right” css=”.vc_custom_1657949407183{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”cms-single-image-load”][cms_space space_lg=”11″ space_md=”40″ space_sm=”40″ space_xs=”45″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cms_row_overflow=”row-overflow-unset” css=”.vc_custom_1658134725919{margin-bottom: 52px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}” el_id=”ocean”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657906289521{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][cms_heading text=”Ocean Freight Services” title_font_size=”36px” title_line_height=”57px” cms_template=”cms_heading.php” el_class=”close-spacing”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906160478{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906385296{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678594445265{margin-bottom: 21px !important;}”]

At our freight forwarding startup, we prioritize finding reliable routes for sea freight to ensure timely delivery of export or import cargo of any type. Providing reliable logistics solutions is our top priority.

Thanks to our strong relationships with major shipping lines and expertise in the industry, we are able to recommend the best shipping lines and routes for your export or import needs. At our company, we specialize in shipping goods by sea, regardless of the size of the shipment. We can handle the entire journey of your goods, from door to door, including customs clearance and the switch to international road transportation via our container trucking services. Trust us to ensure a smooth and efficient delivery of your cargo.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”1822″ img_size=”400×320″ alignment=”right” css_animation=”none” style=”box-overlay-right” css=”.vc_custom_1657947726801{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”cms-single-image-load”][cms_space space_lg=”11″ space_md=”40″ space_sm=”40″ space_xs=”45″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cms_row_overflow=”row-overflow-unset” css=”.vc_custom_1658134735767{margin-bottom: 52px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}” el_id=”road”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657906289521{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][cms_heading text=”Road Freight Services” title_font_size=”36px” title_line_height=”57px” cms_template=”cms_heading.php” el_class=”close-spacing”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906160478{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906385296{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678594583426{margin-bottom: 21px !important;}”]

Our door-to-door cargo services offer an easy and convenient way for you to transport your goods without the need for a dedicated staff or extensive research on freight options. Let us handle the logistics so you can focus on running your business.

Our clients rely on us as an extension of their own operations, knowing that we will always represent them with integrity and professionalism. In India, road freight is a flexible and effective option for many types of goods, including groupage, part loads, full loads, trucking, and nationwide distribution. We offer both direct routes and the option to reload at one of our strategically located terminals. Trust us to find the best solution for your shipping needs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”1825″ img_size=”400×320″ alignment=”right” css_animation=”none” style=”box-overlay-right” css=”.vc_custom_1657948514434{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”cms-single-image-load”][cms_space space_lg=”11″ space_md=”40″ space_sm=”40″ space_xs=”45″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cms_row_overflow=”row-overflow-unset” css=”.vc_custom_1658134753026{margin-bottom: 52px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}” el_id=”warehousing”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657906289521{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][cms_heading text=”Warehousing” title_font_size=”36px” title_line_height=”57px” cms_template=”cms_heading.php” el_class=”close-spacing”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906160478{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1657906385296{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1678594874852{margin-bottom: 21px !important;}”]

Having a well-located and connected warehouse can greatly benefit your shipping and logistics operations. It allows you to consolidate materials and goods for pre-export, optimizing your landside movements and container loads. At our company, we can help you find a warehouse that meets your needs and streamlines your shipping processes.

With our global presence and extensive network, we have the resources and facilities to manage your supply chain at both the origin and destination. By combining shipping with warehousing and distribution services, you can take advantage of a seamless end-to-end solution that reduces the need for multiple logistics providers. This simplifies your logistics process, increases speed, gives you greater control, and improves visibility.

Our deconsolidation solutions offer a range of options depending on where your cargo needs to go, including straight transload or building consignments for direct delivery to distribution centers or final destinations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”1827″ img_size=”400×320″ alignment=”right” css_animation=”none” style=”box-overlay-right” css=”.vc_custom_1657948854904{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”cms-single-image-load”][cms_space space_lg=”11″ space_md=”40″ space_sm=”40″ space_xs=”45″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1657904713632{background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][cms_services_grid col_xs=”1″ col_sm=”1″ col_md=”2″ col_lg=”3″][cms_space space_lg=”80″ space_md=”80″ space_sm=”80″ space_xs=”80″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1555385548962{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][cms_space space_lg=”90″][cms_heading subtitle=”What makes us the right choice?” subtitle_font_size=”17px” subtitle_margin_bottom=”13px” subtitle_color=”#c4273a” text=”Even in today’s complex and uncertain world, our goal remains the same: to earn the trust of our clients through hard work and dedication. We strive to consistently deliver high-quality service and go the extra mile to meet their needs.” tag=”h3″ title_font_size=”24px” title_line_height=”35px” cms_template=”cms_heading–layout3.php”
